description.db:para: This table is used by the AUTH_JWT module to read the actual JWT profiles info More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;auth_jwt.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table key, not used by module

column.name: tag
column.description: Unique ID of the JWT profile

column.name: sip_username
column.description: The SIP username associated with the JWT profile
